borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">01 of 02 - Outbuilding Plans - 27/02/2023</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">02 of 02 - Location &amp; Block - 27/02/2023</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">03 of 06 - Proposed Plans - 30/01/2023</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">04&nbsp;of 06 - Proposed Elevations - 30/01/2023</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">05&nbsp;of 06 - Location &amp; Block - 13/01/2023</span></span></li><li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt">036of 06 - Photos - 13/01/2023</span></span></li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>

<p><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">The outbuilding&nbsp;hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse (No </span><span style="font-size: 14px;">54 Gainsborough Road, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM8 2DP</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">). It shall not be used for purposes conflicting with the use of the property as a single dwellinghouse, and in particular it shall not be used as a separate unit of accommodation.</span><br></p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of part single part double storey rear extension, single storey side extension, and construction of single storey detached outbuilding at rear garden
